mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND MEMBER_ID
AND BOARD_TITLE
AND BOARD_CONTENT
LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_ID, B.COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY C ON B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON B.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE = 1
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

INSERT INTO BOARD( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, CATEGORY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardType}, #{categoryNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, 'Y' )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT( FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
